name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.datanode.slowdisk.low.threshold.ms
description: Threshold in milliseconds below which a disk is definitely not slow.

name: mapreduce.shuffle.max.threads
description:
Max allowed threads for serving shuffle connections. Set to zero
  to indicate the default of 2 times the number of available
  processors (as reported by Runtime.availableProcessors()). Netty is used to
  serve requests, so a thread is not needed for each connection.

name: dfs.stream-buffer-size
description:
The size of buffer to stream files.
  The size of this buffer should probably be a multiple of hardware
  page size (4096 on Intel x86), and it determines how much data is
  buffered during read and write operations.

name: dfs.disk.balancer.max.disk.errors
description:
During a block move from a source to destination disk, we might
      encounter various errors. This defines how many errors we can tolerate
      before we declare a move between 2 disks (or a step) has failed.

name: fs.getspaceused.jitterMillis
description: fs space usage statistics refresh jitter in msec.

name: dfs.namenode.snapshotdiff.listing.limit
description:
Limit the number of entries generated by getSnapshotDiffReportListing within
    one rpc call to the namenode.If less or equal to zero, at most
    DFS_NAMENODE_SNAPSHOT_DIFF_LISTING_LIMIT_DEFAULT (= 1000) will be sent
    across to the client within one rpc call.

name: dfs.client.block.write.locateFollowingBlock.max.delay.ms
description: The maximum delay (unit is ms) before retrying locateFollowingBlock.
